segments.text: Did you read this ? It says that the number one new years resolution make is to spend more time with friends and family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , think about it . We are a society that is always on the go , not because we have to , but because we want to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We work hard and spend less time at home because we are trying to provide for our family with goods and services that are usually unnecessary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t agree , but anyways , I think you should start thinking of a new year ’ s resolution yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s the point ? We always make a new year ’ s resolution and by February we will have forgotten about it . It ’ s pointless .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well then maybe you should resolve to sticking to your goals and objectives .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about you ? Your gym bag is gathering dust and you still have brand new running shoes that are yet to be jogged in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I would go if you kept your promise of going to the gym with me everyday !
segments.speaker: S2
